title: Trump pardons three co-founders of BitMEX crypto exchange
description: Trevor Milton, founder and former CEO of electric truck maker Nikola, revealed that Trump had pardoned him for his criminal conviction for securities fraud.

title: Modern Wealth Management LLC Takes $408,000 Position in iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT)
description: Modern Wealth Management LLC bought a new position in shares of iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT - Free Report) during the fourth quarter, according to the company in its most recent disclosure with the Securities & Exchange Commission.
